© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
52
RDF and RDF Schema
SPARQL query forms: SELECT
@prefix  foaf:  <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .
_:a    foaf:name   "Alice" .
_:a    foaf:knows  _:b .
_:a    foaf:knows  _:c .
_:b    foaf:name   "Bob" .
_:c    foaf:name   "Clare" .
_:c    foaf:nick   "CT" .
PREFIX foaf:    <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
SELECT ?nameX ?nameY ?nickY
WHERE
{ ?x foaf:knows ?y ;
foaf:name ?nameX .
?y foaf:name ?nameY .
OPTIONAL { ?y foaf:nick ?nickY }
}
nameX
nameY
nickY
"Alice"
"Bob"
"Alice"
"Clare"
"CT"
speaker: SYSTEM
